name: TestsByMicroscopicObservationInBlood
title: Tests by Microscopic Observation in Blood
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains test codes for reporting microscopic observation in blood.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Microscopic observation Blood),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
